column4: You scoundrel!! You shall know the consequences of your actions!

column2: 나으리... \n왜란으로 농토도 황폐해졌는데 가뭄까지 겹쳐 \n조세는 둘째치고 먹을 쌀조차 없습니다요...
column4: A-A... After war, our fields have turned barren, and now we face a drought. We have nothing left, not even rice to eat...

column2: 뭣이? \n네놈이 굶어죽는 한이 있더라도, \n나라에 대한 도리를 지켜야 할 것 아니냐!
column4: What? Even if you were to starve, should you not uphold your duty to the nation!

column2: 정신이 번쩍 들도록 곤장 맛을 보여줘야겠구나!
column4: I shall teach you a lesson that will snap you back to your senses!

column2: 여봐라! 이놈을 당장 끌고 가서 정신을 차리도록 잔뜩 두들겨주어라!
column4: Look here! Take this fool with you and make sure he regains his senses through a thorough beating!

column2: 그리고 가서 기생들을 들라 하라. \n무식한 상놈을 상대하려니 지치는......
column4: And bring the a dancer. I'm tired of dealing with ignorant scum...
Receive the inspection of the royal inspector!
